profileAlternative.name: Jenna Hozeska
profileAlternative.headline: HTML Email Developer at Wayfair
profileAlternative.summary:
Email Marketing Specialist - Designing newsletters; converting PSDs to responsive HTML email templates; testing browser and email client compatibility; optimizing emails with A/B Tests of subject lines, send times and content; managing multiple contact lists and accounts.

Web Content Administrator - Adding, editing and strategizing content for consumer, technical and B2B audiences on multiple websites; altering minor web changes and implementing major web designs using Drupal content management system; setting up event websites with agendas, registration forms and reporting functions; testing, troubleshooting and recommending improvements for multiple platforms.

Project Manager - Work on digital projects from start to finish including strategy, managing expectations, setting up timelines, staying within budget, facilitating approvals and implementing final deliverable; manage relationships between internal departments and external marketing agencies.


Expert skills in Dreamweaver, ExactTarget, Word, Excel, Powerpoint; strong skills in Drupal and Photoshop; intermediate skills in Wordpress. Familiarity with Basecamp, Redmine, Brightcove, G2Planet, Salesforce.

positions.title: Staff Communications Coordinator, Web Marketing
positions.description:
• Manage consumer and B2B focused content on multiple websites
• Strategize new brand/content integration into existing content structures
• Design, HTML code, test and send email communications for multiple industries and contact lists
• Set up event websites with agendas, registration forms, reporting functions
• Test, troubleshoot and recommend improvements for multiple platforms
• Daily use of Drupal, Dreamweaver, Photoshop, ExactTarget, Salesforce
• Consistent use of Basecamp, Redmine, Lingotek, G2Planet

positions.title: Internet Marketing Manager / Web Content Administrator
positions.description:
• Managed written and graphic content for nine websites using Drupal Content Management System
• Alter edwebsite designs and functions through Drupal and HTML, CSS
• Designed, coded, tested and sent HTML emails for seven different industries
• Instructed others to use Drupal for website updates
• Researched and implemented new digital marketing strategies
• Assigned content gathering/publishing tasks to others
• Implemented five brand new websites in 12 months
…

positions.title: The San Diego Union-Tribune
positions.description:
• Created and updated content on jobs.sdmarketplace.com using HTML
• Maintained online recruitment advertising
• Managed ad unit traffic throughout SignOnSanDiego website
• Coordinated multiple teams’ sales, billing, and customer service
• Wrote product descriptions and design sales collateral for online media kits
• Reported extensively on site traffic, visitor activity, advertisement effectiveness
• Received U-Team award for implementation of first Virtual Job Fair using HTML and recruitment websites
